ygData.subject: RE: Switching items
ygData.messageBody:
Doh!
*slaps head*


Thanks!
Leaflay


> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Kim [SMTP:kim@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 1:33 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Switching items
>
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Ben Wilson wrote:
> >
> > I have tried to figure out how to do this, and I'm at a terrible loss.
> I
> > made hot keys for my melee slots, 1 and 2, and I made a hot key for an
> > inventory slot. When I try any of these hot keys, nothing happens. It
> would
>
> Nothing happens if you press the number key associated with
> that hotkey. You have to treat them just like your actual
> inventory slots and use the mouse to pick up and rop items.
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
